fno: In the cash market, the Nifty 50 rose 116 points or 0.59% to settle at 19,727.05. The NSE's India VIX, a gauge of market's expectation of volatility over the near term, rose 1.82% to 10.87. HDFC Bank, Reliance Industries (RIL) and Coal India were the top traded individual stock futures contracts in F&O segment of NSE. The September 2023 F&O contracts will expire on 28 September 2023.
